subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Less than a decade removed from the obscurity of Division I-AA, the Huskies can earn an automatic berth in the Bowl Championship Series with victories in their final three games.
snippet: Less than a decade removed from the obscurity of Division I-AA, the Huskies can earn an automatic berth in the Bowl Championship Series with victories in their final three games.
